name: Penalty
text: §321-18  Penalty.  Except when another penalty is provided, every person who violates any rule of the department, after the same has been adopted, as provided in section 321-10, shall be guilty of a misdemeanor. [PC 1869, c 59, §8; RL 1925, §914; RL 1935, §906; am L 1943, c 18, §1; RL 1945, §2020; am L 1947, c 82, §1; RL 1955, §46-18; am L 1965, c 96, §29; HRS §321-18; am L 1983, c 100, §3]
